subject: review: Debian as a desktop system
body:
Hello,
there is an interesting review at
http://www.freesoftwaremagazine.com/article/debian_as_a_desktop_system
regards.
Andre Felipe Machado

Ps: already posted a link at http://wiki.debian.org/PressCoverage2007
